lexUnit.name: sweet.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having the pleasant taste characteristic of sugar or honey; not salt, sour, or bitter.

sentence.text: The water tasted sweet and pure .
And butter of course â€¦ and those little tomatoes that taste sweet , of the sun .
